jobs_results.title: FLUTTER DEVELOPER
Mobile Developer - Android - Spend & Cards
jobs_results.description:
Wise is one the fastest growing companies in Europe and we‚Äôre on a mission: to make money without borders the new normal. We‚Äôve got 10 million customers across the globe and we‚Äôre growing. Fast.

Current banking systems don't let us send, spend or receive money across borders easily. Or quickly. Or cheaply.

So, we‚Äôre building a new one.

And, we‚Äôre looking for a Android developers at all levels to join our mission and help provide our customers with the best mobile experience possible.

Money without borders - instant, convenient, transparent and eventually free. During the 10 years since our launch, we helped millions of customers, but there are customers who were suffering the most from the bank FX fees and needed new, better banking tools to manage their money internationally. To address this need we launched borderless account that is offering multi-country, cross-border banking in one app. Now we‚Äôre powering money for people and businesses: to pay, to get paid, to spend, in any currency, wherever you are, whatever you‚Äôre doing.The Wise card is a key part of the borderless proposition, it is responsible for the "spend" part of the general vision. Card issuing is the best way to let customers spend their money in the modern world, but we should keep in mind that real plastic cards are only one of a possible solution to spending problems. Tomorrow it could be virtual cards, apple and google pays, QR codes, mobile payments, or something else that is not yet invented.

Our mission statement for the Spend and Wise Platform tribe is: Give our customers reliable, easy to use and eventually free way to pay from borderless accounts everywhere in the world.

What does it take?
‚Ä¢ A passion for technology, product and user experience
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Continuous Delivery approach
‚Ä¢ The ability to work independently and plan your own solutions to problems
‚Ä¢ Thinking from the customer perspective and putting them at the heart of everything you do

Is that you?
‚Ä¢ Great communication skills and the ability to articulate complex, technical concepts to non-technical audience
‚Ä¢ Experience building Android apps that delight users
‚Ä¢ Full-stack Android development (Activities, Fragments, Views, Services, Broadcast Receivers, Content Providers, SQLite, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Experience with Android libraries (such as Android ViewModels, Room DB, RxJava, Kotlin Flows, Android Navigation, Dagger DI, Gson, Kotlin X, Retrofit etc.)
‚Ä¢ The desire for creating clean, testable code
‚Ä¢ Practical experience of SOLID principles and when and how to apply them
‚Ä¢ Experience working with a version control system like git
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of REST API Design

‚Ä¶but don‚Äôt worry we don‚Äôt expect you to know everything!

What the first six months in this role will look like:
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôll have onboarded and found your place through understanding your team and guild vision and how you can contribute
‚Ä¢ Understanding the Fintech domain and our tech culture
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôll have fully developed new features, from planning to release, and keep monitoring their adoption once live
‚Ä¢ Gone through two quarterly plannings and proposed ideas to take your product further

What you get back:
‚Ä¢ The autonomy to solve problems your way
‚Ä¢ The freedom to have real impact
‚Ä¢ Loads of development opportunities
‚Ä¢ A fun work environment with social activities and events

And more‚Ä¶ Check out our offer here.
Interested? Find out more:
‚Ä¢ How we work - a practical guide
‚Ä¢ Wise Vlogs: Omar, Engineering Lead
‚Ä¢ Engineering team blog
‚Ä¢ How our Engineers build new features

We‚Äôre people without borders ‚Äî without judgement or prejudice, too. We want to work with the best people, no matter their background. So if you‚Äôre passionate about learning new things and keen to join our mission, you‚Äôll fit right in.

Also, qualifications aren‚Äôt that important to us. If you‚Äôve got great experience, and you‚Äôre great at articulating your thinking, we‚Äôd like to hear from you.

And because we believe that diverse teams build better products, we‚Äôd especially love to hear from you if you‚Äôre from an under-represented demographic.

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Engineer - Automotive OS
jobs_results.description:
WE ARE LOOKING FOR

Senior Android Engineer Automotive OS

We are looking for Senior Android Engineer to our team. You will start your journey either in a selected customer project or in Unikie's internal product development team, depending on your profile and available opportunities

Your future colleagues are waiting for you to join our international team. Working with us is uncomplicated, there‚Äôs a good team spirit, low-hierarchy and nonexistent bureaucracy. Our way of working is flexible too, many of our team work remotely from home with visits to our office from time to time when needed. This role is equally challenging, and as such we offer a very good compensation.

Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Design and develop modular, scalable infotainment applications on Android Automotive OS.
‚Ä¢ Create design patterns and libraries to facilitate application development.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product and UI/UX design, to define application features.
‚Ä¢ Identify and resolve application bottlenecks for performance optimization.
‚Ä¢ Conduct code reviews and practice continuous integration and development.
‚Ä¢ Write test code to ensure quality, robustness, and functional correctness, including edge cases.
‚Ä¢ Design and implement application updates and releases.
‚Ä¢ Investigate the Android Automotive OS codebase for better application performance and integration.
‚Ä¢ Develop sample and demo applications utilizing our technology.
‚Ä¢ Engage in continual learning through workshops, conferences, and talks.

Required Qualifications
‚Ä¢ Proven Android application developer with 7+ years of experience.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Kotlin, Java and C++ is nice to have.
‚Ä¢ Ability to manage workload with minimal supervision.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in using Android and Android Jetpack APIs, including general knowledge of Android NDK and JNI.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Android design principles, application interface guidelines, performance, and testing frameworks.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with embedded Android framework services.
‚Ä¢ Experience with developing mapping, multimedia, and Bluetooth solutions is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with push notifications, APIs, and cloud messaging.
‚Ä¢ Experience with continuous integration tools, such as Jenkins.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Agile Scrum practices.
‚Ä¢ Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to collaboratively work with and influence cross-functional teams.
‚Ä¢ Good to have: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Software Engineering; MS preferred.

jobs_results.title: Mobile App developer
jobs_results.description:
We are an ambitious startup participating in the Prototron competition, focused on developing an innovative mobile app prototype. We are seeking a Mobile App Developer to join our dynamic team. You will play a key role with another app developer in designing and building our initial prototype, collaborating closely with product managers. If you're passionate about mobile technology, enjoy working in a fast-paced startup environment, and are ready to make an impact, this is the opportunity for you.

Responsibilities:

- Develop and maintain mobile app features for our prototype.
- Collaborate with the team to create a user-friendly and efficient app interface.
- Write clean, scalable, and well-documented code.
- Provide technical expertise to help shape the app‚Äôs overall functionality.

Qualifications:
- Proven experience in mobile app development (iOS/Android).
- Knows programming languages like Swift, Kotlin, React Native, or Flutter.
- Passion for innovation and problem-solving.

Join us in bringing our vision to life and making an impact at Prototron!

jobs_results.title: Mobile Application Developer for Fintech and Banking Projects
jobs_results.description:
About the Company

Addendum is a global software development firm specializing in fintech, banking, and telco industries. We offer tailored benefits, diverse projects with various tech stacks, and opportunities for growth, freedom, and responsibility.
Job Summary

We are seeking a skilled Mobile Application Developer to join our team. This contract-based role involves developing high-quality native Android applications using Java and/or Kotlin, designing solutions that prioritize performance, security, and user experience, and maintaining high code quality standards.
Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Developing native Android applications with a focus on performance, security, and user experience.
‚Ä¢ Maintaining clean, efficient, and well-documented code while actively sharing knowledge with the team.
‚Ä¢ Providing mentorship and guidance to junior Android developers.
‚Ä¢ Staying updated with the latest trends and best practices in user interface and user experience design.
Requirements
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in developing native Android applications.
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of Android architecture, design patterns, and best practices for app development.
‚Ä¢ Expertise in creating secure, high-performance solutions with a focus on user experience (UX) and user interface (UI).
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of modern tools and practices, including version control systems (e.g., Git) and Agile methodologies.
Benefits
‚Ä¢ Flexible hours: work when you're at your best.
‚Ä¢ Top talent collaboration: join award-winning teams from different countries.
‚Ä¢ Diverse, challenging projects: break free from the ordinary with dynamic, stimulating work.
‚Ä¢ Epic team events: join us for summer and winter parties and online events.
‚Ä¢ Special celebrations: we love a good shindig for birthdays and project milestones.
Additional Benefits
‚Ä¢ Rock star benefits: from health and wellness to tech gadgets, we've got it covered.
‚Ä¢ Flexible work options: you choose your work style: from the office to a beach in Bali.
‚Ä¢ Healthy work-life balance: easy sick-leave and unlimited work-from-home options.
Estimated Salary Range

‚Ç¨ 20 - ‚Ç¨35 per hour, depending on your experience.

jobs_results.title: Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Belarus, Poland, Kazakhstan

We are looking for experienced Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers to join our core product ‚Äì BOSS Revolution.

You have a chance to work with a team of outstanding professionals on a challenging product.

You will never be bored‚Äîour team is dynamic, as are our products. Be ready to face thrilling professional challenges and use your strong hard and soft skills to solve them as a Team player.

Your primary responsibility is end-to-end development and support of our user experience in our customer-facing apps.

Join us if you want to:
‚Ä¢ Have a unique work experience with a really strong engineering team!
‚Ä¢ Become a part of a multinational and cross-functional team.
‚Ä¢ Boost your career with a big international product company and have new growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Work on new innovative features and bug fixes in a Scrum Team.
‚Ä¢ Take responsibility for the full software development life-cycle.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with business stakeholders and be a part of the product development team.
‚Ä¢ Demonstrate your technology-agnostic positive attitude with the ability to learn and desire to implement solutions using various technologies.
‚Ä¢ Work on high-performing, mission-critical, scalable, and resilient applications and services.
‚Ä¢ Drive aggressive technical debt reduction in close collaboration with developers and automation test engineers.
Join us, if you have:
‚Ä¢ Have around one year of Flutter cross-platform development experience.
‚Ä¢ Have 5+ years of hands-on mobile development experience (Android and/or iOS).
‚Ä¢ Are truly passionate about mobile development.
‚Ä¢ Can communicate in English (B2+).
‚Ä¢ Are a constant learner.
You can please us with:
‚Ä¢ Experience in configuring mobile CI pipelines.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge and experience beyond mobile stack.
We offer you:
‚Ä¢ An exciting and challenging job with talented people around.
‚Ä¢ Really good hardware (a laptop with 32 GB RAM and 512 GB SSD).
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Remote work opportunity (with the opportunity to work from offices in Minsk and Warsaw).
‚Ä¢ Superb English lessons.A few words about us:

IDT Corporation is a global communications company founded in 1990 and headquartered in Newark, New Jersey. We are industry leaders in prepaid communication and payment services and one of the largest international voice carriers. We are listed on the NYSE, employ over 1800 people across 20 countries, and have over $1.5 billion in revenues.

We are not ‚Äùanother big IT corporation‚Äù‚Äî we encourage and support in-house entrepreneurs in developing their ideas into business actions.

Our flagship brand, Boss Revolution, offers Money Transfer, International Calling, and Mobile Top-Up services and supports IDT‚Äôs mission of enabling people to keep in touch and share resources with family and friends worldwide.

If you are here, it seems like you are interested, so let‚Äôs chat! üòâ

jobs_results.title: Senior Mobile Cross-Platform Developer (Firebase)
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: EMEA

About us:

Talent has no borders. Proxify's mission is to connect top developers around the world with opportunities they deserve. So, it doesn't matter where you are; we are here to help you fast-track your independent career in the right direction. üôÇ

Since our launch, Proxify's developers have successfully worked with 1200+ happy clients to build their products and growth features. 3500+ talented developers trust Proxify and its network to fulfil their dreams and objectives.

Proxify is shaped by a global network of supportive, talented developers interested in remote full-time jobs. Our Glassdoor (4.5/5) and Trustpilot (4.8/5) ratings reflect the trust developers place in us and our commitment to our members' success.

The Role:

We are looking for a Senior Mobile Cross-platform Developer with strong proficiency with Firebase for one of our clients. You are a perfect candidate if you are growth-oriented, you love what you do, and you enjoy working on new ideas to develop exciting products.

What we‚Äôre looking for:
‚Ä¢ Minimum of 5 years of experience in mobile application development with a strong portfolio of released applications.
‚Ä¢ Extensive experience with Firebase services and integrations in mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in mobile development frameworks and languages such as Flutter, React Native, Swift, Kotlin, and Java.
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of testing frameworks and debugging tools for mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a proactive approach to identifying and resolving issues.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and maintain high-performance mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms using Flutter, React Native, or native languages (Swift, Kotlin).
‚Ä¢ Implement and manage Firebase services such as Authentication, Firestore, Realtime Database, Cloud Functions, Cloud Messaging, and Crashlytics to enhance mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code with a focus on reusability and best practices. Conduct unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing to ensure application stability and performance.
‚Ä¢ Identify and troubleshoot performance bottlenecks in mobile applications and optimise for maximum performance and user experience.

What Proxify offers
‚Ä¢ Career-accelerating positions at cutting-edge companies
‚Ä¢ Discover exclusive long-term remote engagements at the world's most interesting product companies.
‚Ä¢ Hand-picked opportunities, just for you
‚Ä¢ Skip the typical recruitment roadblocks and biases with personally matched engagements.
‚Ä¢ Fast-track your independent developer career
‚Ä¢ Start small and gain more freedom to take on new engagements as you build your independent developer career.
‚Ä¢ A recruitment process that values your time
‚Ä¢ Only one hiring process with the possibility of several positions, without any additional tests.

This offer from "Proxify" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Flutter Developer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: European Union

Who we are
We‚Äôre an award-winning development agency at the heart of Vilnius City with clients all around the world. Being a premier development agency we only work for the best, with the best. We specialize in web & mobile development and bespoke UX/UI design. No matter how big or small our client‚Äôs organization and budgets are, we‚Äôve got a solution for them. This means you have a chance to work with both small and medium-sized businesses. We also provide outsourcing & outstaffing services to our clients.
What we are looking for
Looking for a Flutter developer for a full-time job as a contractor in our clients team.

Day to Day
‚Ä¢ Flutter application development
‚Ä¢ Working together with other developers, project manager and UX/UI designer to build smooth & scalable app
‚Ä¢ Learn best software development practises with your colleagues
‚Ä¢ Contribute to quality by identifying spots of improvements
‚Ä¢ Experience with REST API, HTTPS
You are someone who has...

‚Ä¢ At least 2 year experience with Flutter SDK and Dart language
‚Ä¢ Rich experience in different screens layouting/supporting

‚Ä¢ Understanding and experience with state-management patterns: Provider, BLoC / MobX

‚Ä¢ Strong communication, problem-solving skills
‚Ä¢ Fluency in English language
‚Ä¢ Experience (as an advantage) with Flutter for Web, Flutter for Desktop/ Flutter Platform Channels; in Android development (Android SDK)/ iOS development (Xcode, iOS SDK); with Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban)
Why you‚Äôll love working with Scale3C
‚Ä¢ Work with some of the world‚Äôs leading and most recognized brands

‚Ä¢ Cool and vibrant work environmentInterested in the position? We are looking forward to your application, to connect and talk more!

Best regards,
Talent acquisition team
